io.sarl.sre.services.context

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.lang.core.SRESpecificDataContainer
      • io.sarl.lang.core.AgentProtectedAPIObject
        • io.sarl.lang.core.AgentTrait
          • io.sarl.sre.services.context.Context
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AgentContext

    public class Context
extends AgentTrait
implements AgentContext
    Implementation of an agent context in the SRE platform.

    This class is thread-safe.

    Version:
    io.janusproject.plugin 0.12.0 20210527-171007
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Nicolas Gaud, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject.sre
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.plugin

        public new(id : UUID,
           defaultSpaceID : UUID,
           owner : Agent,
           spaceRepositoryProvider : javax.inject.Provider<SpaceRepository>,
           factories : javax.inject.Provider<Factories>,
           loggingService : LoggingService,
           listenerFactory : SpaceRepositoryListenerFactory)
        Constructs a Context.
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of the context.
        defaultSpaceID - identifier of the default space in the context.
        owner - is the owner of the context. If null, it is the root context.
        factories - the provider of factories.
        spaceRepositoryProvider - the provider of space repository
        logger - the logging service.
        listenerFactory - the factory of space listeners.

      • isRootContext

        @Pure
public def isRootContext() : boolean 
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Replies if the context is a root context.

        A root context is associated to the platform kernel agent, which is not created into memory. For example, it means that there is no parent registered into the default space.

        Specified by:
        isRootContext in interface AgentContext
        Returns:
        true if the context is a root context.

      • getSpace

        @Pure
public def getSpace(spaceUUID : UUID) : S  with <S extends Space>
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Retrieve, but do not create, an instance of space following the given ID. This function tries to find a space that fits the given specification. If none was found, this function replies null.
        Specified by:
        getSpace in interface AgentContext
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the replied space.
        Parameters:
        spaceUUID - identifier of the space.
        Returns:
        the space, or null if there is no space found.
        See Also:
        AgentContext.createSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), AgentContext.getOrCreateSpace(Class, UUID, Object...)

      • createSpace

        public def createSpace(spec : Class<? extends SpaceSpecification<S>>,
                       spaceUUID : UUID,
                       creationParams : Object*) : S  with <S extends Space>
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Create an instance of space following the given specification. This function always creates a new instance of space. It means that is a space with the given identifier already exists, this function does nothing and replies null. If you want to find an existing space prior to the creation of a new one, you should use AgentContext.getOrCreateSpace(Class, UUID, Object...).
        Specified by:
        createSpace in interface AgentContext
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the created space.
        Parameters:
        spec - specification of the space to create.
        spaceUUID - identifier of the new space.
        creationParams - parameters to pass to the space constructor.
        Returns:
        the new space, or null if the space already exists.
        See Also:
        AgentContext.getOrCreateSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), AgentContext.getSpace(UUID)

      • getOrCreateSpaceWithSpec

        public def getOrCreateSpaceWithSpec(spec : Class<? extends SpaceSpecification<S>>,
                                    spaceUUID : UUID,
                                    creationParams : Object*) : S  with <S extends Space>
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Retrieve or create an instance of space which was created with the given specification.

        This function tries to find a space that was created with the given specification. If none was found, this function creates a new space with the given space identifier and creation parameters.

        Caution: This function ignores the default space when searching for a space created with an EventSpaceSpecification or OpenEventSpaceSpecification. Consequently, in the case of the spec argument is one of the previous types, and there is no other space in the context that was created with this specification, then the function creates a totally new space.

        Caution: The spaceUUID parameter is used only if no existing space created with the given specification was found.

        Specified by:
        getOrCreateSpaceWithSpec in interface AgentContext
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the replied space.
        Parameters:
        spec - specification of the space to retrieve/create.
        spaceUUID - identifier used only when creating the space.
        creationParams - parameters to pass to the space constructor.
        Returns:
        the space, never null and never the default space.
        See Also:
        AgentContext.getOrCreateSpaceWithID(UUID, Class, Object...), AgentContext.createSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), AgentContext.getSpace(UUID)

      • getOrCreateSpaceWithID

        public def getOrCreateSpaceWithID(spec : Class<? extends SpaceSpecification<S>>,
                                  spaceUUID : UUID,
                                  creationParams : Object*) : S  with <S extends Space>
        Description copied from interface: AgentContext
        Retrieve or create an instance of space with the given identifier.

        This function tries to find a space with the given identifier. If none was found, this function creates a new space with the given specification and creation parameters.

        Caution #1: The spaceUUID parameter is given to the specification when creating the space.

        Caution #2: The spaceUUID parameter is equal to the identifier of the default space in this context, then the default space is returned by this function.

        Specified by:
        getOrCreateSpaceWithID in interface AgentContext
        Type Parameters:
        S - - type of the replied space.
        Parameters:
        spec - specification of the space for creating the space.
        spaceUUID - identifier of the space.
        creationParams - parameters to pass to the space constructor.
        Returns:
        the space, never null.
        See Also:
        AgentContext.getOrCreateSpaceWithID(UUID, Class, Object...), AgentContext.createSpace(Class, UUID, Object...), AgentContext.getSpace(UUID)
